Features.name: Ingredient based recipe search
Features.text: The user can take a picture of his/her ingredients or enter menually. The app will show recipes that the user can cook right now with the availble ingredients!

Features.name: Planning of household menu
Features.text: According to users preferences & inventory, the app recommands recipes for the coming week. Then, user can add all missing ingredients to a shopping list.

Features.name: Household grocery management
Features.text: The app allows users to order their shopping list directly, and remembers what ingredients the user own. That way it can reccomand recipes that utilize it, minimize food waste, and save money.
